ChangeList.Description: Removed the previously deprecated **changeItemBase** resource and its associated APIs and derived types that support the Microsoft Entra lifecycle announcements APIs. The APIs stopped returning data in May 2025. Use the [Microsoft Entra release notes RSS feed instead](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/fundamentals/whats-new).

Removed the previously deprecated **announcement** resource and its associated APIs and derived types that support the Microsoft Entra lifecycle announcements APIs. The APIs stopped returning data in May 2025. Use the [Microsoft Entra release notes RSS feed instead](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/fundamentals/whats-new).

Removed the previously deprecated **roadmap** resource and its associated APIs and derived types that support the Microsoft Entra lifecycle announcements APIs. The APIs stopped returning data in May 2025. Use the [Microsoft Entra release notes RSS feed instead](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/fundamentals/whats-new).

Deprecated the **changeItemBase** resource and its associated APIs and derived types that support the Microsoft Entra lifecycle announcements APIs. The APIs will stop returning data in May 2025. Use the [Microsoft Entra release notes RSS feed instead](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/fundamentals/whats-new).

Added the **announcement** resource. Use this resource to track Microsoft Entra change announcements including deprecations, breaking changes, retirements, feature changes, and Microsoft-managed policies.
Added the **changeItemBase** resource. Use this resource to track planned changes or new features in Microsoft Entra.
Added the **productChanges** relationship to the [identityContainer](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityContainer?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **roadmap** resource. Use this resource to view the Microsoft Entra product roadmap which comprises public previews and recent general availability releases.
